title: @CertainlyT Please never EVER make/change any champions again ever.
body:
**TL;DR his champions and changes to them are bad for gameplay.**

___

I don't wanna put this too harsh, but everything you touch just goes downhill. Like the opposite of the Midas touch. Something worse.

Let's start with the basics. Google "CertainlyT". You'll come up with a boatload of popular threads that have been spawning over *years* stating how CertainlyT should not even be *allowed* to design any more champions.

*"They're fun to play and make flashy plays!"* you say. You can give a champion glitter bombs for abilities, I don't care, but the second you give a champion

 **double crit chance, a shield for around 25% of his max hp at lvl 18,
a critically-striking tornado, an ability that can nullify most ultimates in the game,
infinite dashes, an AoE suspension on almost no cooldown, and 50% bonus armor penetration**
#ALL WHILE HAVING NO MANA COSTS
You gotta problem. If you go around throwing out champions like this anymore, this game's gonna be nothing but people blinking all over the map with 1,000 movespeed. And you know what? This isn't the only problematic champion you've made. I could go on for days about Darius, Thresh, Kalista. But what I'm most afraid about is Mordekaiser.

As stated by [This thread right here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/AFgsaz6L-certainlyts-reasoning-behind-forcing-morde-into-bot), CertainlyT wants Morde bot because he can't be healthy in a solo lane. Instead of try to fix this, They gut his W so it's only useful in a duo-lane. This Idiot working at Riot goes head-first into the rework without any remorse for the players. I myself loved Mordekaiser. Never played him support, don't know how it goes, but what I **do** know is that the last thing Morde wants is to be some adc's bitch.

In addition, there have been numerous complaints about CertainlyT in the past. This issue isn't a new one, really. Like I said before, google "CertainlyT".

[Stating that He shouldn't be allowed to make champions](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/yqioklAk-certainlyt-should-not-be-allowed-to-make-another-champion)
[Stating he is the worst game designer at Riot](http://www.gamefaqs.com/boards/954437-league-of-legends/68934978)
[Stating that (in another comment) he is working for the wrong damn game](http://www.gamefaqs.com/boards/954437-league-of-legends/68934978?page=0)

Well, that's the end of my rant. Take it or leave it, upvote it or downvote it, report me or not, I don't care. It's my opinion and I want to get it out there.

#Just please to GOD, NEVER TOUCH ANY CHAMPIONS AGAIN
